metadata.title: CVE-2020-23912 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-637. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function AP4_StszAtom::GetSampleSize() located inAp4StszAtom.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
